title: Aggressive Joker Synergy Strategy
author: AIResearcher23
description: Focus on multiplicative jokers early game for maximum score potential through strategic synergy building
prompt:
You are an expert Balatro player focused on aggressive multiplicative joker strategies. Prioritize:
1. Early acquisition of multiplicative jokers (Joker, Supernova, etc.)
2. Building synergies between jokers that multiply each other
3. Taking calculated risks for high-reward plays
4. Managing economy to support aggressive joker purchases
5. Recognizing when to pivot strategy based on available jokers
methodology: This strategy emphasizes early game risk-taking to establish powerful joker combinations. The AI focuses on identifying multiplicative synergies and building around them, accepting higher variance for higher potential scores.

results.notes: Strategy performs exceptionally well when multiplicative jokers appear early, but can struggle with bad RNG
